name: The Dream Caster (Brackeys 2021.1)
description: The Dream Caster is a top-down pixel art psychical horror game made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1. It tells a story of two friends Jerry and Nick who are a paramedic and a psychologist. Their objective is to infiltrate an old man's house to give him his medication while not dying from his living nightmares.
